Item ID13105

Varrock armour 2 is a reward from completing the medium Varrock Diary. The armour is received from Toby in Varrock and can be retrieved from him for free if lost. Its stats are identical to those of a Black platebody.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-10
 Defence bonuses
+41+40+30-6+40
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

Benefits[edit | edit source]

From Varrock armour 2[edit | edit source]

  • 30 battlestaves from Zaff every day for 7,000 coins each.
  • When worn, 10% chance of mining 2 ores at once up to mithril (with some exceptions), granting xp for both ores mined.
  • When worn, 10% chance of smelting 2 bars at once up to mithril when using the Edgeville furnace.
  • The ability to change your Varrock Teleport location to just outside the Grand Exchange.
  • Skull sceptre will now hold up to 18 charges.
    • Individual skull sceptre parts now give 2 extra bone fragment, adding together for combined parts.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
24 March 2016
(update | poll)
  • It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
  • The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
26 November 2015
(update)

Fixed an issue with Varrock armour benefits and manually using items on a furnace.

7 May 2015
(update)

Varrock armour now provides an additional soft clay when mining with a bracelet of clay, rather than clay.

30 April 2015
(update)

Varrock armour mining benefits now apply when mining tin, limestone, sandstone and runite golem corpses.

[[File:Varrock armour 2 detail.png|120px|left]]
'''Varrock armour 2''' is a reward from completing the [[medium Varrock Diary]]. The armour is received from [[Toby]] in [[Varrock]] and can be retrieved from him for free if lost. Its stats are identical to those of a [[Black platebody]].

{{Infobox Bonuses
|astab = 0
|aslash = 0
|acrush = 0

|arange = -10
|dstab = +41
|dslash = +40
|dcrush = +30
|dmagic = -6
|drange = +40
|str = 0

|mdmg = 0
|prayer = 0
|slot = body
|image = [[File:Varrock armour 2 equipped male.png|170px]]
|altimage = [[File:Varrock armour 2 equipped female.png|170px]]
}}

==Benefits==
===From Varrock armour 2===
*30 [[Battlestaff|battlestaves]] from [[Zaff]] every day for 7,000 coins each.
*When worn, 10% chance of mining 2 ores at once up to [[mithril ore|mithril]] (with [[Mining_enhancers#Exceptions|some exceptions]]), granting xp for both ores mined.
*When worn, 10% chance of smelting 2 bars at once up to [[mithril bar|mithril]] when using the [[Edgeville]] furnace.
*The ability to change your [[Varrock Teleport]] location to just outside the [[Grand Exchange]].
*[[Skull sceptre]] will now hold up to 18 charges.
**Individual skull sceptre parts now give 2 extra [[bone fragment]], adding together for combined parts.

==Changes==
{{Subject changes header}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 24 March 2016
|update = White & Black Graceful
|poll = Old School Content Poll 40: Vanilla LootShare & QoL
|change = *It is now also possible to get multiple copies of achievement diary equipment by talking to relevant diary masters or by talking to Perdu, found upstairs in the Edgeville general store. Perdu will charge a small fee.
*The "Destroy" option was replaced with a "Drop" option.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 26 November 2015
|update = Zulrah Scale Fishing
|change = Fixed an issue with Varrock armour benefits and manually using items on a furnace.
}}
{{Subject changes

|update = Slayer Partners & Teleports
|change = Varrock armour now provides an additional soft clay when mining with a bracelet of clay, rather than clay.
}}
{{Subject changes
|date = 30 April 2015
|update = Mutagens, Mo & Much More
|change = Varrock armour mining benefits now apply when mining tin, limestone, sandstone and runite golem corpses.
}}
